note.p: Death: Lesketh-how, near Ambleside, Westmorland (24 January 1868)
Research Field: Physiology, chemistry, natural history
Career: Army Surgeon; Inspector General of Army Hospitals; medical staff, Ceylon (1816-1820)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1867-1868 vol 16 pp lxxix-lxxxi
References: N G Coley, 'The Animal Chemistry Club; Assistant Society to the Royal Society' in NR 1967 vol 22 pp 173-185
